resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/Daily T-7 Amzaon Order Details Incremental Load')]

activities.name: Get Max Date from Order Detail

source.sqlReaderQuery: Select convert(varchar, DateAdd(DD,-7,max(order_date)), 23)  as maxdate from Amazon_OMS_Order_Details_staging

activities.name: Copy data Amazon Item Data

dependsOn.activity: Get Max Date from Order Detail

query.value:
SELECT 
DISTINCT 
ws.sale_id AS Order_Id
,ws.sale_code
,ws.created_date AS Order_Date
,STR_TO_DATE(ws.processing_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as processing_date
,STR_TO_DATE(ws.invoice_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as invoice_date
,ws.user_name AS Customer_Name
,ws.Customer_id
,ws.store_id
,wd.rx_type AS RX_type
,wd.product_id
,wd.mrp
,wd.price
,wd.quantity
,ws.coupon_discount AS discount_on_order
,ws.coupon_code
,ws.grand_total
,ws.order_invoice_amt
,ws.txn_status
,ws.payment_type AS Payment_mode
,ws.online_TXN
,ws.ERP_transactionid AS ERP_Id
,ws.order_invoice_no AS Invoice_no
,ws.delivery_status AS Order_Status
,ws.partial_invoice
,ws.DMS_jobid
,ws.dman_id
,ws.dman_name
,ws.thirdPartyJobStatus
,ws.three_pl_name
,STR_TO_DATE(ws.DMS_eta_IST,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS Actual_Delivery_date
,STR_TO_DATE(ws.delivered_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS Delivered_date
,ws.cancel_reason
,ws.remark
,ws.MFM_timeframe
,ws.sale_platform
,ws.dman_payment_status AS Reconciled
,ws.collected_amount AS Collected_amount
,p.item_code
,concat(ws.store_id, '/', ws.sale_id, '/', p.item_code) as brcode_orderid_itemcode_key
,ws.order_parent_id
,ws.buyer
FROM wellnessDB.order_details wd
LEFT JOIN wellnessDB.sale ws ON wd.sale_id = ws.sale_id
left JOIN setproduct_items sp ON sp.set_id=wd.product_id
left JOIN product p ON sp.product_id=p.product_id
WHERE
STR_TO_DATE(ws.created_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >='@{activity('Get Max Date from Order Detail').output.firstRow.maxdate}'
AND wd.status = 1 and ws.sale_platform='6' and p.item_code IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY ws.sale_id ASC

convert(date,order_date) >='@{activity('Get Max Date from Order Detail').output.firstRow.maxdate}'

activities.name: Get Max Date from Order Detail

source.sqlReaderQuery: Select convert(varchar, DateAdd(DD,-7,max(order_date)), 23)  as maxdate from OMS_Cancel_Order_Details

activities.name: MySQL to SQL server Cancel Order

dependsOn.activity: Get Max Date from Order Detail

query.value:
SELECT DISTINCT 
ws.sale_id AS Order_Id
,ws.sale_code
,ws.created_date AS Order_Date
,STR_TO_DATE(ws.processing_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as processing_date
,STR_TO_DATE(ws.invoice_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as invoice_date
,ws.user_name AS Customer_Name
,ws.Customer_id
,ws.store_id
,wd.rx_type AS RX_type
,wd.product_id
,wd.mrp
,wd.price
,wd.quantity
,ws.coupon_discount AS discount_on_order
,ws.coupon_code
,ws.grand_total
,ws.order_invoice_amt
,ws.txn_status
,ws.payment_type AS Payment_mode
,ws.online_TXN
,ws.ERP_transactionid AS ERP_Id
,ws.order_invoice_no AS Invoice_no
,ws.delivery_status AS Order_Status
,ws.partial_invoice
,ws.DMS_jobid
,ws.dman_id
,ws.dman_name
,ws.thirdPartyJobStatus
,ws.three_pl_name
,STR_TO_DATE(ws.DMS_eta_IST,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS Actual_Delivery_date
,STR_TO_DATE(ws.delivered_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS Delivered_date
,ws.cancel_reason
,ws.remark
,ws.MFM_timeframe
,ws.sale_platform
,ws.dman_payment_status AS Reconciled
,ws.collected_amount AS Collected_amount
,wd.item_code
,concat(ws.store_id, '/', ws.sale_id, '/', wd.item_code) as brcode_orderid_itemcode_key
,ws.order_parent_id
,ws.buyer
FROM wellnessDB.order_details wd
LEFT JOIN wellnessDB.sale ws ON wd.sale_id = ws.sale_id
WHERE 
STR_TO_DATE(ws.created_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >='@{activity('Get Max Date from Order Detail').output.firstRow.maxdate}'
AND wd.status = 1 and ws.delivery_status like '%cancel%'
ORDER BY ws.sale_id ASC

activities.name: Copy data invoice master

dependsOn.activity: Copy data EG Inv_det file to Staging Table
Copy data EG inv_mst File to Staging table

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select c_br_code, c_order_id, d_date, c_item_code, [Net Sales]
,concat(c_br_code,'/', c_order_id, '/', c_item_code) as brcode_orderid_itemcode_key 
,Cost_value,
convert(decimal(18,2),([Net Sales]- Cost_value)) as Margin_value,
converT(decimal(18,2),(Spl_Disc_Amt + Disc_Amt)) as Tot_Disc_Amt,
getDate() as Load_DateTime
from
(select c_br_code, c_order_id, d_date,
	case when c_item_code = 'COD' then null
			else c_item_code end as c_item_code
			, [Net Sales],Cost_value,Spl_Disc_Amt,Disc_Amt,Load_DateTime    from
(select	inv_mst_staging.c_br_code,
		inv_mst_staging.c_order_id,
		inv_mst_staging.d_date,
		inv_det_staging.c_item_code,
		sum(inv_det_staging.n_taxable_amt) as "Net Sales",
		convert(decimal(18,2),((n_qty + n_qty1)* n_eff_pur_rate)) as Cost_value,

		case when inv_det_staging.n_gst_enabled=1 then ((n_mrp *n_qty) -(n_sale_rate*n_qty))
			 when ((n_mrp *n_qty) -(n_sale_rate*n_qty)) < 1 then 0 else ((n_mrp *n_qty) -(n_sale_rate*n_qty)) end as Spl_Disc_Amt,

		isnull((n_sale_rate*(n_qty + n_qty1)) * (case when n_non_taxable_ret =0 then 0 else n_disc_rs /n_non_taxable_ret end),0) + convert(decimal(18,2),((n_sale_rate*(n_qty + n_qty1))*n_disc_per/100)) as Disc_Amt,
		getDate() as Load_DateTime
		
from		dbo.inv_det_staging
inner join 
			dbo.inv_mst_staging
			on 
			dbo.inv_det_staging.c_br_code = inv_mst_staging.c_br_code
	and inv_det_staging.c_prefix = inv_mst_staging.c_prefix
	and inv_det_staging.c_year = inv_mst_staging.c_year
	and inv_det_staging.n_srno = inv_mst_staging.n_srno
where inv_mst_staging.c_patient IS NOT NULL and  inv_mst_staging.c_cust_code = 'GC93' or inv_mst_staging.c_cust_code = 'GC793' or inv_mst_staging.c_cust_code = '751' and inv_det_staging.n_cancel_flag = 0 
group by inv_mst_staging.c_br_code, 
        inv_mst_staging.c_order_id,
		inv_mst_staging.d_date,
		 inv_det_staging.c_item_code,
		 n_qty,n_qty1,n_eff_pur_rate,
		 inv_det_staging.n_gst_enabled,n_mrp,n_sale_rate,n_non_taxable_ret,n_disc_rs,n_disc_per) a) b

resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/Daily T-7 OMS Order Details Incremental Load')]

activities.name: Get Max Date from Order Detail

source.sqlReaderQuery: Select convert(varchar, DateAdd(DD,-7,max(order_date)), 23) as maxdate from OMS_Order_Details

activities.name: MySQL to SQL server

dependsOn.activity: Get Max Date from Order Detail

query.value:
SELECT DISTINCT 
ws.sale_id AS Order_Id
,ws.sale_code
,ws.created_date AS Order_Date
,STR_TO_DATE(ws.processing_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as processing_date
,STR_TO_DATE(ws.invoice_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as invoice_date
,ws.user_name AS Customer_Name
,ws.Customer_id
,ws.store_id
,wd.rx_type AS RX_type
,wd.product_id
,wd.mrp
,wd.price
,wd.quantity
,ws.coupon_discount AS discount_on_order
,ws.coupon_code
,ws.grand_total
,ws.order_invoice_amt
,ws.txn_status
,ws.payment_type AS Payment_mode
,ws.online_TXN
,ws.ERP_transactionid AS ERP_Id
,ws.order_invoice_no AS Invoice_no
,ws.delivery_status AS Order_Status
,ws.partial_invoice
,ws.DMS_jobid
,ws.dman_id
,ws.dman_name
,ws.thirdPartyJobStatus
,ws.three_pl_name
,STR_TO_DATE(ws.DMS_eta_IST,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS Actual_Delivery_date
,STR_TO_DATE(ws.delivered_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS Delivered_date
,ws.cancel_reason
,ws.remark
,ws.MFM_timeframe
,ws.sale_platform
,ws.dman_payment_status AS Reconciled
,ws.collected_amount AS Collected_amount
,wd.item_code
,concat(ws.store_id, '/', ws.sale_id, '/', wd.item_code) as brcode_orderid_itemcode_key
,ws.order_parent_id
,ws.buyer
FROM wellnessDB.order_details wd
LEFT JOIN wellnessDB.sale ws ON wd.sale_id = ws.sale_id
WHERE 
STR_TO_DATE(ws.created_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >='@{activity('Get Max Date from Order Detail').output.firstRow.maxdate}'
AND wd.status = 1
ORDER BY ws.sale_id ASC

activities.name: Copy data into Excel

source.query:
Select ( cogs.c_br_code ) as c_br_code,
		( cogs.c_year ) as c_year,   
		( cogs.c_prefix ) as c_prefix,   
		( cogs.n_tran_no ) as n_tran_no,   
		( cogs.c_act_code ) as c_act_code,   
		( cogs.d_date ) as d_date,   
		SUM( cogs.n_amount ) as n_amount,   
		( cogs.c_opp_act_code ) as c_opp_act_code,   
		( cogs.c_ref_br_code ) as c_ref_br_code,
		( cogs.c_ref_no ) as c_ref_no,   
		( cogs.d_chq_date) as d_chq_date,   
		( cogs.c_remark ) as c_remark,   
		( cogs.c_act_name ) as c_act_name,   
		( cogs.c_opp_act_name ) as c_opp_act_name,
		( cogs.c_add_1 ) as c_add_1,
		( cogs.c_add_2 ) as c_add_2, 
		( cogs.c_add_3 ) as c_add_3,
		( cogs.c_city ) as c_city,
		( cogs.n_ref_srno ) as n_ref_srno,
		( cogs.n_order_no ) as n_order_no,
		( cogs.recon_dt) as recon_dt,
		( if recon_dt is null then 0 else 1 endif ) as chq_pass,
		( cogs.multi_act_name) as multi_act_name,
		isnull( case when n_amount  > 0 then n_amount else 0 end,0) as Debit,
		isnull( case when n_amount  < 0 then n_amount else 0 end,0) as credit
From
(
	SELECT ( ledger.c_br_code ) as c_br_code,
			( ledger.c_year ) as c_year,   
			( ledger.c_prefix ) as c_prefix,   
			( ledger.n_tran_no ) as n_tran_no,   
			( ledger.c_act_code ) as c_act_code,   
			( ledger.d_date ) as d_date,   
			( ledger.n_amount ) as n_amount,   
			( ledger.c_opp_act_code ) as c_opp_act_code,   
			( ledger.c_ref_br_code ) as c_ref_br_code,
			( settle_mst_header.c_ref_no ) as c_ref_no,   
			date(settle_mst_header.d_ref_date) as d_chq_date,   
			( settle_mst_header.c_remark ) as c_remark,   
			( act_mst_a.c_name ) as c_act_name,   
			( act_mst_b.c_name ) as c_opp_act_name,
			( act_mst_a.c_add_1 ) as c_add_1,
			( act_mst_a.c_add_2 ) as c_add_2, 
			( act_mst_a.c_add_3 ) as c_add_3,
			( act_mst_a.c_city ) as c_city,
			( grn_mst.n_ref_srno ) as n_ref_srno,
			( gdn_mst.n_order_no ) as n_order_no,
			(d_reconcile_date) as recon_dt,
			(if recon_dt is null then 0 else 1 endif) as chq_pass,
			if ledger.c_opp_act_code='~~~~~~~~~~~~' then 
				(select list(ac.c_name+' : '+string(n_amount),char(13)) from ledger ll , act_mst ac  where ac.c_code=ll.c_act_code and
						ll.c_br_code=ledger.c_br_code and ll.c_year=ledger.c_year
						and ll.c_prefix=ledger.c_prefix and ll.n_tran_no=ledger.n_tran_no and 
						(ledger.n_amount<0 and ll.n_amount>0 or ledger.n_amount>0 and ll.n_amount<0))
			else '' endif as multi_act_name
    FROM ledger
				inner join (select c_br_code as brcode from branch_group_det where length('701') = 6 and c_code = '701' and  branch_group_det.n_cancel_flag = 0 
            union 
            select c_code from act_mst where length('701')<> 6 and c_code >= (if '701' = 'zzz' then '701' else '701' endif ) and ( c_code <= '701' ) 
            ) brlist on brlist.brcode=ledger.c_ref_br_code  
			left outer join settle_mst_header  on  ledger.c_br_code = settle_mst_header.c_br_code  and 
			 ledger.c_year = settle_mst_header.c_year  and 
          ledger.c_prefix = settle_mst_header.c_prefix  and 
          ledger.n_tran_no = settle_mst_header.n_srno  
          left outer join grn_mst on  ledger.c_br_code = grn_mst.c_br_code  and 
				ledger.c_year = grn_mst.c_year  and 
				ledger.c_prefix = grn_mst.c_prefix  and 
				ledger.n_tran_no = grn_mst.n_srno
			left outer join gdn_mst  on  ledger.c_br_code = gdn_mst.c_br_code  and 
				ledger.c_year = gdn_mst.c_year  and 
				ledger.c_prefix = gdn_mst.c_prefix  and 
				ledger.n_tran_no = gdn_mst.n_srno
				left outer join reconcile_mst  on  ledger.c_br_code= reconcile_mst.c_br_code and ledger.c_year = reconcile_mst.c_year and
														  ledger.c_prefix = reconcile_mst.c_prefix and  ledger.n_tran_no = reconcile_mst.n_srno, 
          act_mst act_mst_a,   
         act_mst act_mst_b  
   WHERE 
         ( act_mst_a.c_code = ledger.c_act_code ) and 
         ( act_mst_b.c_code = ledger.c_opp_act_code ) and	
         ( ( ledger.d_date >= '2021-10-01' ) and	
         ( ledger.d_date <= getDate() ) and 
         ( ledger.c_act_code >= 'GC794' ) and 
         ( ledger.c_act_code <= 'GC794' )   and
			( ledger.n_amount <> 0) )
	Union All
	 SELECT ( ledger.c_br_code ) as c_br_code,
			( ledger.c_year ) as c_year,   
			( ledger.c_prefix ) as c_prefix,   
			( ledger.n_tran_no ) as n_tran_no,   
			( ledger.c_act_code ) as c_act_code,   
			( ledger.d_date ) as d_date,   
			( ledger.n_amount ) as n_amount,   
			( ledger.c_opp_act_code ) as c_opp_act_code,   
			( ledger.c_ref_br_code ) as c_ref_br_code,
			( settle_mst_header.c_ref_no ) as c_ref_no,   
			date(settle_mst_header.d_ref_date) as d_chq_date,   
			( settle_mst_header.c_remark ) as c_remark,   
			( act_mst_a.c_name ) as c_act_name,   
			( act_mst_b.c_name ) as c_opp_act_name,
			( act_mst_a.c_add_1 ) as c_add_1,
			( act_mst_a.c_add_2 ) as c_add_2, 
			( act_mst_a.c_add_3 ) as c_add_3,
			( act_mst_a.c_city ) as c_city,
			( grn_mst.n_ref_srno ) as n_ref_srno,
			( gdn_mst.n_order_no ) as n_order_no,
			(d_reconcile_date) as recon_dt,
			(if recon_dt is null then 0 else 1 endif) as chq_pass,
			if ledger.c_opp_act_code='~~~~~~~~~~~~' then 
				(select list(ac.c_name+' : '+string(n_amount),char(13)) from ledger ll , act_mst ac  where ac.c_code=ll.c_act_code and
						ll.c_br_code=ledger.c_br_code and ll.c_year=ledger.c_year
						and ll.c_prefix=ledger.c_prefix and ll.n_tran_no=ledger.n_tran_no and 
						(ledger.n_amount<0 and ll.n_amount>0 or ledger.n_amount>0 and ll.n_amount<0))
			else '' endif as multi_act_name
    FROM cogs_ledger as ledger
				inner join (select c_br_code as brcode from branch_group_det where length('701') = 6 and c_code = '701' and  branch_group_det.n_cancel_flag = 0 
            union 
            select c_code from act_mst where length('701')<> 6 and c_code >= (if '701' = 'zzz' then '701' else '701' endif ) and ( c_code <= '701' ) 
            ) brlist on brlist.brcode=ledger.c_ref_br_code  
			left outer join settle_mst_header  on  ledger.c_br_code = settle_mst_header.c_br_code  and 
			 ledger.c_year = settle_mst_header.c_year  and 
          ledger.c_prefix = settle_mst_header.c_prefix  and 
          ledger.n_tran_no = settle_mst_header.n_srno  
          left outer join grn_mst on  ledger.c_br_code = grn_mst.c_br_code  and 
				ledger.c_year = grn_mst.c_year  and 
				ledger.c_prefix = grn_mst.c_prefix  and 
				ledger.n_tran_no = grn_mst.n_srno
			left outer join gdn_mst  on  ledger.c_br_code = gdn_mst.c_br_code  and 
				ledger.c_year = gdn_mst.c_year  and 
				ledger.c_prefix = gdn_mst.c_prefix  and 
				ledger.n_tran_no = gdn_mst.n_srno
				left outer join reconcile_mst  on  ledger.c_br_code= reconcile_mst.c_br_code and ledger.c_year = reconcile_mst.c_year and
														  ledger.c_prefix = reconcile_mst.c_prefix and  ledger.n_tran_no = reconcile_mst.n_srno, 
          act_mst act_mst_a,   
         act_mst act_mst_b  
   WHERE 
         ( act_mst_a.c_code = ledger.c_act_code ) and 
         ( act_mst_b.c_code = ledger.c_opp_act_code ) and	
         ( ( ledger.d_date >= '2021-10-01' ) and	
         ( ledger.d_date <= getDate() ) and 
         ( ledger.c_act_code >= 'GC794' ) and 
         ( ledger.c_act_code <= 'GC794' )   and
			( ledger.n_amount <> 0) ) --and :li_cogs =1
) as cogs 
Group By c_br_code,c_year,c_prefix,n_tran_no,c_act_code,d_date,c_opp_act_code,c_ref_br_code,c_ref_no,   
		d_chq_date,c_remark,c_act_name,c_opp_act_name,c_add_1,c_add_2,c_add_3,c_city,n_ref_srno,
		n_order_no,recon_dt,multi_act_name
UNION   ALL
  SELECT ('') as c_br_code,
			('00') as c_year,   
         ('OP') as c_prefix,   
         ( 0 ) as c_tran_no,   
         ( ledger.c_act_code ) as c_act_code,   
         ( date('2021-10-21')) as d_date,   
         sum(ledger.n_amount) as n_amount,   
         ( '' ) as c_opp_act_code,   
         ( '' ) as c_ref_br_code,   
         ( '' ) as c_ref_no,   
         date('2021-10-21') as d_chq_date,   
         ( '' ) as c_remark,   
         ( act_mst.c_name ) as c_act_name,   
         ( 'Opening Balance' ) as c_opp_act_name,
			( act_mst.c_add_1 )  as c_add_1,
			( act_mst.c_add_2 )  as c_add_2, 
			( act_mst.c_add_3 )  as c_add_3,
			( act_mst.c_city ) as c_city,
			(0) as n_ref_srno,
			(0) as n_order_no,
			( null )  as recon_dt,
			( 0 )  	as chq_pass,
			( '' ) as multi_act_name	,
		isnull( case when n_amount  > 0 then n_amount else 0 end,0) as Debit,
		isnull( case when n_amount  < 0 then n_amount else 0 end,0) as credit
    FROM dba.ledger
				inner join (select c_br_code as brcode from dba.branch_group_det where length('701') = 6 and c_code = '701' and  branch_group_det.n_cancel_flag = 0 
            union 
            select c_code from dba.act_mst where length('701')<> 6 and c_code >= (if '701' = 'zzz' then '701' else '701' endif ) and ( c_code <= '701' ) 
            ) brlist on brlist.brcode=ledger.c_ref_br_code,  
         act_mst  
   WHERE ( act_mst.c_code = ledger.c_act_code ) and  
         ( ( ledger.d_date <= getDate() ) and	
         ( ledger.c_act_code >= 'GC794' ) and	
         ( ledger.c_act_code <= 'GC794' ) )   
GROUP BY c_act_code,c_act_name,c_add_1,c_add_2,c_add_3,c_city


UNION


Select ( cogs.c_br_code ) as c_br_code,
		( cogs.c_year ) as c_year,

		( cogs.c_ref_no ) as c_ref_no,

		isnull( case when n_amount  > 0 then n_amount else 0 end,0) as Debit,
		isnull( case when n_amount  < 0 then n_amount else 0 end,0) as credit

				inner join (select c_br_code as brcode from branch_group_det where length('751') = 6 and c_code = '751' and  branch_group_det.n_cancel_flag = 0
